channel.title: Lufalyze Updates
channel.description: Latest updates and releases for Lufalyze - Professional Audio Loudness Analyzer

item.title: Lufalyze 2.0 - Mobile Responsiveness and Dark Mode
item.description: Major update with comprehensive mobile responsiveness, enhanced dark mode support, professional footer, and improved user experience across all devices.
item.author: richard@lufalyze.com (Richard Tillard)

item.title: Enhanced Visualizations and Professional Features
item.description: Added comprehensive waveform analysis, spectrogram visualization, dynamics analysis, and platform-specific loudness targets for streaming services.
item.author: richard@lufalyze.com (Richard Tillard)

item.title: WebAssembly Performance Optimization
item.description: Improved audio processing performance with optimized WebAssembly implementation, faster LUFS calculation, and reduced memory usage for large audio files.
item.author: richard@lufalyze.com (Richard Tillard)

item.title: EBU R128 and ITU-R BS.1770-4 Compliance
item.description: Full implementation of professional broadcasting standards for loudness measurement, ensuring accurate LUFS calculations for professional audio workflows.
item.author: richard@lufalyze.com (Richard Tillard)
